subject: Helmets
Baseball
New Models, Design and Products
Concussions
organizations: National Operating Committee on Standards for Athletic Equipment
lead_paragraph: For Rawlings, the official provider of helmets to Major League Baseball, the S100 Pro Comp is the latest and best attempt at protecting players at the plate.
snippet: For Rawlings, the official provider of helmets to Major League Baseball, the S100 Pro Comp is the latest and best attempt at protecting players at the plate.
